name: aspa

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
A fundamental premise in ExMatEx is that scale-bridging performed in
heterogeneous MPMD materials science simulations will place important
demands upon the exascale ecosystem that need to be identified and
quantified.

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description:
CLBlast is a modern, lightweight, performant and tunable OpenCL BLAS
library written in C++11. It is designed to leverage the full
performance potential of a wide variety of OpenCL devices from different
vendors, including desktop and laptop GPUs, embedded GPUs, and other
accelerators. CLBlast implements BLAS routines: basic linear algebra
subprograms operating on vectors and matrices.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.
